citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process between 11:05 AM and
12:05 PM on 07NOV2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by having the store manager call
when the inspectors arrived and calling the licensee at 11:27 AM. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement
action.
Additional Inspectors:
KURT HAMMEL, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process between 11:05 AM and 
12:05 PM on 07NOV2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by having the store manager call 
when the inspectors arrived and calling the licensee at 11:27 AM. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and 
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement 
action. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KURT HAMMEL, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
